title: Biboumi – An XMPP-to-IRC gateway
author: louiz
content: biboumixmpp gateway irc.biboumi is free, libre open source xmpp gateway connects irc servers translates between two protocols. goal is let xmpp users part irc discussions, using favourite xmpp client. provides following features: * connection an unlimited number xmpp users an unlimited number irc servers * persistent connections a configured list channels, making behave an irc bouncer * basic channel features: join, part, view set topic, view set channel user modes, kick, nick change * private conversations * notices * invitations * irc colors (receive ) * tls connections irc servers * channel listing * ctcp version ping * dynamic per-user, per-server configuration using xmpp ad-hoc commands data-forms * automatic sending a command connection (mostly used send identify message nickserv other authentication services) * support sending arbitrary irc commands a server * embedded identd server * message archive management supportdownloadlatest releasesbiboumi-5.0.tar.xz
